question:
You recently went to a public event (for example an exhibition, festival, or show) that you think your friend would enjoy. Write a letter to friend. In your letter
tell your friend what the event was

explain why you think your friend would like the event
invite them to come to the event with you
text: How are you and everyone at home? Hope you are doing  great? I'm happy to tell you that I later went to the masquerade show that we talked about the last time we saw.

To be sincere, it wasn't planned, I went to the show with my mum .I later got to know that the community celebrated this event every month of April of the year.  It is a way of coming together for the local people of the community, they dance around the areas with the masquerade and their newly harvested crops.  It is something that is interesting to watch.
I'm very sure you would like to see this event because it says something about the local community and how they celebrate their gods ,which I know is part of the courses you're doing in school.

I'll be very glad if you can spare part of your time with me next week for us both to see the final stage of the event. This would gives opportunity to catch up and spend time with each other and also a way of learning for you  .
Take good care of yourself and I hope to see you soon

error_list.error_des: The verb gives after the modal verb would does not appear to be in the correct form. Consider changing the verb form.
